      • RecordExists

        java.lang.Boolean RecordExists(IDeathRecord drTarg)
        Tests whether a specified record already exists in the database
        Parameters:
        drTarg - The death record whose existence is to be tested
        Returns:
        true if the database contains a death record matching the SSAN of drTarg, otherwise false

      • Match

        IDeathRecord Match(long SSAN)
        Queries the database for a specified social security account number
        Parameters:
        SSAN - The SSAN to test for
        Returns:
        the matching death record, if one exists, otherwise null
